name: Stick or Stone?
description:
An absurd game that will test your ability to determine when it is better to use a stone instead of a stick and conversely. Includes real-life situations. Can you really tell the difference between the two?

Made for the great One Hour a Day Jam.

Controls
  • Use the mouse to choose between the stick or the stone for each situation;
  • Use the mouse to navigate in Menus.
Credits
  • All sounds in this game are taken from freesoundand are in the public domain. Special thanks to ddmyzik and zagi2 for the musics;
  • The font used in the game is Pixellari by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante;
  • Images are heavily modified pictures taken mostly from Unsplash. Special thanks to Noémi Macavei-Katócz (Labrador) and Stephen Rheeder (Sailor).
